website_summaries.verdict: The Plantronics Voyager Edge's impressive hands-free call quality and sleek size makes it a smarter buy than the fashionable Jawbone Era.
pros: The Plantronics Voyager Edge packs outstanding call quality and noise cancellation
The headset is also light, comfortable to wear, and compact for a boom-style device
The Edge comes with a handy battery case for protection and charging on the go
cons: The Voyager Edge’s ear tips don’t form a tight audio seal and take some fiddling to position properly

customer_reviews.title: Great voice quality - lower than expected lifespan
customer_reviews.text: This is the U.S version. I just returned another one of these to a vendor from Amazon because they sent me the European version. The differences have to do with wavelength and the languages and dialects. The functional quality is very good, in my opinion, both inside and outside. The quality of the lifespan probably isn't, though. My first one lasted about two years, then died. From reading about this product, lifespan seems to be an issue. I use it a lot for work, so even if it has a shorter than expected lifespan, the voice quality and comfort make up for it.
customer_reviews.author: james hilton

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the extra cost
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth one. Dog ate one, left one in Illinois on a trip and ran over one. The price has dropped each time and the quality and clarity is the best. I have had at least 20 different headsets and none come close to the voyager Edge. Well worth the extra cost above other headsets. I use my phone in my business daily and I have never had anyone say, "It sounds like you are in a well!"
customer_reviews.author: PTF_Sr

customer_reviews.title: its not good as expected
customer_reviews.text: initially it was working well.after few weeks ...bluetooth is not detected by iphone 6 plus.I thought it would be a problem of iphone and then I went to 5th ave apple store ,ny.They had checked the iphone with other blutooth devices and they are working well with my iphone.they told that it was ur blutooth headset problem.(even apple customer service told that,if ur not satisfied,we will exchange your mobile with new one,but i had realised that it was my problem of selecting plantronics)
customer_reviews.author: dinesh vasista

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: battery life says 6 hours after a charge- only get 2 hours-otherwise -ok
customer_reviews.author: david merena

customer_reviews.title: the sound quality was great while it held onto the call and my ear ...
customer_reviews.text: Awful product! The ear piece kept falling out and it kept dropping calls. The ONE plus... the sound quality was great while it held onto the call and my ear hahaha!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for a while then the mic fails (3 different units)
customer_reviews.text: The Edge started out great. However, it is not durable. Each of the three I've owned has had the same problem, the mic gets faint and the other party cannot hear you. Don't buy this model... instead look at the Voyager Focus UC which is binaural and does both mobile and laptop is awesome... it also cancels ambient noise beautifully making it very quiet even if you're not on the phone or listening to music. And speaking of music, the fidelity is excellent on the Voyager Focus. But unlike the Edge, you can't drop it in your pocket... its only limitation.
customer_reviews.author: M. Baraz

customer_reviews.title: Open box item. Pieces missing and box was ripped ...
customer_reviews.text: Open box item. Pieces missing and box was ripped open before. NOT NEW!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Came fast be doesn't work good. Has a lot of static and doesn't stay ...
customer_reviews.text: Came fast be doesn't work good. Has a lot of static and doesn't stay connected to my phone. Would have sent it back but the box got thrown away. When I buy a new one it won't be. From the same people.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Young

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and design!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound and design. Very happy with this new headset.
customer_reviews.author: Amateur Chef, Photographer, Handyman, Athlete

customer_reviews.title: tho I can hear them fine..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in June and now in Sept people cannot hear me , tho I can hear them fine ... I liked the unit until this happened . I have tried to re-cinc up all to now avail. The warranty has expired so not happy that is lasted only 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M.
